name: Abandoned World
description:
Abandoned world is RPG Shooter Action Sci-Fi.

A character who has survived the destruction, of the world
by war and the use of nuclear weapons,
as well as the outbreak of a virus, trying to survive and find a solution
In the game, the character faces Dead walkers and soldiers of evil organizations trying to find a way back to society and humanity, but is forbidden to cross the road, and search and cross difficult ways, glaciers and deserts to find a way to survive and recover Life for the past.


Environments
From forests and meadows, to snowy plains, deserts and caves
winter is both beautiful and deadly.

Appearances
Discover the beautiful and hostile world - post-apocalyptic desert,
brought to life with day / night wonders and dynamic weather.

Differently
You face different abilities and strengths, so use your skills.
Find the best opportunity between soldiers and Dead walkers and show no mercy.

Improve
When traveling, always be aware of the traps of soldiers ,
Secretly face the soldiers and collect silent weapons and more ammunition.
